entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to snow in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in wind prone areas early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
